reviews.sentence: Walking from hotel to Staples center is not very romantic. during the evening.

Josh. Booked here a week before for 2 nights. When we arrived the young black haired Caucasian with glasses at the front was short with us and rudely spoken. We got our keys and went straight to get something to eat and bring back. we arrived 40 mins later back the hotel. When we brought our luggage up and opened the door what we found was saddening. Crumbs on the floor and stains. a bad musky smell along with stains on the beds. we went straight to the front immediately and asked if we could have our money returned and we would look for a hotel elsewhere. once again the young man at the front was rude and tried in Noway to help us he told us he could move us to another room and if we left we would still be charged 50 percent of one night and that we had been their an hour already. I pleaded with him that we had went first to get something to eat and had not seen the room till now and he would not listen. So another guy from the front desk took us to show us another room which when he walked in with us I immediately showed him a threading needle laying on the floor and once again looked like the room had not been cleaned properly and was in pot condition. And I was very upset this time and I told him please return our money and he refused. So we lost 530 dollars and we did not even stay. me and my wife have never experienced anything like this with a hotel or even remotely close to this in our life. we are sorry to post this but we were done very wrong and we would like to advise anyone else to be very cautious and check your room immediately when you go to this hotel or they will put you in bad conditions and still takeyour money and claim you have been their an hour already.

Old hotel being renovated. This is a old hotel that is being renovated. The linens customer service and price where good. The bathrooms where tiny and impossible to get ready with two people. Overall you get what you pay for.

Poor value for money bit of a dump. First the one and only but very important positive. the hotels location is great just a few minutes from the Staples Center walkable. Being old is fine but this hotel has not been maintained for a very long time. From the musty smelling sheets and nasty smelling rooms to cardboard covered holes in the wall and strange pit like bathtub shower that is a huge risk for anyone using it. There was almost no water in the sink. it is the kind of place where every time I took an Uber to be dropped off at the hotel I had to point out the place and say. yeah that dumpy looking building in the corner that is the one. it is got the overall The Shining kind of ambiance to the corridors and rooms with floors in rooms bathrooms badly in need of refurbishment and cleaning. The service folks at reception were not bad but they were not too helpful either for example asking for a fork and a plate I was told there were none even though there is a restaurant in the hotel lobby the bellman was fine too. If this were a 30 motel I would still be disappointed but not as badly but for what these guys charge this is not a good deal.

too expensive. the only thing we liked was having an elevator. the valet parking was 20 because there was no where to park. the valet charge should have been included in the room price. 168 for a tiny double size bed was ridiculous. and the shower was tiny also had no room to even turn around. the toilet was really close to the wall. unles you are really skinny your body is touching the wall as you sit on itthe room was very tiny. barely had room to move around. the bed was supposed to be a queen but was a double too small for us. was not worth the money.

Honestly. Truly. The room is smaller than most walk in closets. It was a sofa bed I thought it was clean until I looked under the mattress and saw a big box of something that I was too scared to look into and used tissues. the only reason why I slept here is because the room was already paid for and it was after midnight. In the morning when we went to go and get the car from the 30 valet. there was only one valet attendant and a line of 7 people waiting already. it was also pretty difficult to check out given that I made the reservations through hotelscom and they did not know where to look in order to check me out so it took a while.

Good place to stay but do not trust the cabby they get for you. It was being redone inside and out. The rooms were good though. The location was a bit sketchy we asked for a cab the morning we were leaving and they did not have one for us. When one did come he were charged 60 for the ride to LAX that lasted maybe 20 mins. I think he may of asked a friend or relative to be our cab. When we 1st got to LAX to go to our hotel it was an hour and 20 mins drive in yet was only charged 26 dollars. We called the Hotel and told them how Uncool that was to take advantage of people.

Upgrade work on this hotel is in progress. I hope this includes more practical room design staff friendly and helpful. Room looked stylish but was impractical in a number of ways. The most frustrating short coming was no reading light near the bed in fact to turn off the nearest light to the bed you needed to get out onto a raised platform. Lighting generally was poor. To see to unpack my bag I had to take every thing close to the hall way lighting. The easy chair was the most uncomfortable thing I have ever sat on.
Bad neighborhood and under renovation. The hotel is in a very bad area of town. It is also under heavy renovation it should be nice in about a year.
Good. Easy access to downtown. Reasonable price.

Disappointing. Style of hotel is nice the lounge area is modern and with a nice atmosphere. Rooms needs to be updated bathroom was dirty and very small. Hey poor customer service from staff at check in he was rude and would n’t honor the information I had on my reservation and had to pay additional 20 per night plus the cost for parking even when my reservation said parking fee was included.

Exceptional. The room was spacious and beautiful. The bed was way too comfortable. we did n’t want to get out of bed. And try the food downstairs. We were extremely impressed. The food and service were top drawer for sureAbsolutely nothing.
Thursday night at the Mayfair super relaxing and enjoying the vibe here.

Exactly as advertised. We were very comfortable but we felt the room was not as clean as it could be. The staff was extremely accommodating and friendly and though the area was under construction and a little off the beaten track it was an easy walk to the Staples Centre and some nice restaurants. The wifi was not very reliable and that made it difficult to get some work done. However it was better than expected and for the price friendly staff we would stay again.

Sold on Boutique Hotels. Awesome hotel. Just a few blocks from downtown with easy access to great food. Loved the design of the hotel and all the great places to lounge and get some work done. Plan on returning for a pleasure trip to enjoy it even more very soon.

Cool hotel but needs more attention to detail. Hip hotel with a nice modern renovation. Nice lobby and staff was friendly. Convenient coffee place and restaurant with great choices. Rooms need more attention to detail. Dispensers did not work in shower no chair for desk no way to read or get light in bed. Outside noise was a problem at night.
Wonderful. Great location near to central metro lines for easy travel all over the City. The hotel lobby was one of the best we have seen. Large spacious room. Nothing.

Not what I expected. The loby downstairs area is really nice and upon checking in the people at the desk were nice as well. Although when you get to your room or atleast my room was just really dingy and had a wired smell to it. I was honestly kinda grossed out to even use the restroom never used it and it was also really tiny. If your someone that gets anxious in small places I would n’t consider booking. Something that I really did n’t like and was unaware of is that parking is not complimentary and it costs 36 DOLLARS. To leave your care parked their over night.

Beautiful decor room decent size bathroom tiny smallest bathroom ever been inExposed wiring and tv is in terrible location also needs swivel bracket. Great location friendly staff. Would definitely stay again but probably request different room.
